Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G G/C G/B C]
Verse 1: Here is [G]love vast as the [C]ocean Loving-[G]kindness as the [D]flood When the [G]Prince of Life our [C]Ransom Shed for [G]us His [D/F#]precious [G]blood[G/C G/B C]
[(REPEAT Verse 1)]
Chorus 1: Who His [G]love will not [D/F#]remember Who can [Dsus]cease to [D]sing His [G]praise He can [Em7]never be for[C2]gotten Throughout [G]Heav'n's e[D/F#]ternal [G]days [G/C G/B C]
Verse 2: On the [G]mount of cruci[C2]fixion Fountains [G]opened deep and [D]wide Through the [G]floodgates of God's [C2]mercy Flowed a [G]vast and [D/F#]gracious [G]tide
{new_page} Chorus 2: Grace and [G]love like mighty [D/G]rivers Poured incessant from [G]above Heav'n's [Em7]peace and perfect [C]justice Kissed a [G]guilty [D/F#]world in [G]love
Repeat Chorus 1:
[G G/C G/B C]
(BRIDGE): [G]No love is higher[G/C2] no love is wider [G/B]No love is deeper[C] no love is truer [G]No love is higher[G/C] no love is wider [G/B]No love is like Your[C] love O Lord
Ending: Here is [G]love vast as the [G/C]ocean [Dsus G/C] [(REPEAT)]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 here is love vast as the ocean lovingkindness as the flood when the prince of life our ransom shed for us his precious blood chorus 1 who his love will not remember who can cease to sing his praise he can never be forgotten throughout heavns eternal days verse 2 on the mount of crucifixion fountains opened deep and wide through the floodgates of gods mercy flowed a vast and gracious tide chorus 2 grace and love like mighty rivers poured incessant from above heavns peace and perfect justice kissed a guilty world in love repeat chorus 1 bridge no love is higher no love is wider no love is deeper no love is truer no love is higher no love is wider no love is like your love o lord ending here is love vast as the ocean

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G G/C G/B C]
(BRIDGE): [G]No love is higher[G/C2] no love is wider [G/B]No love is deeper[C] no love is truer [G]No love is higher[G/C] no love is wider [G/B]No love is like Your[C] love O Lord
VERSE:
[Em]Long my impr[Cmaj7]isoned sp[G]irit l[D]ay Fast b[Em]ound in [Cmaj7]sin and n[G]ature’s n[D]ight Thine [Em]eye diff[Cmaj7]used a qu[G]ickening r[D]ay I [Em]woke the d[Cmaj7]ungeon fl[G]amed with l[D]ight My c[Em]hains fell off, my [Cmaj7]heart was free I r[G]ose went forth and f[D]ollowed Thee
CHORUS: Am[G]azing l[D]ove how [C]can [D]it [G]be That [C]Thou [Am]my [G]God [C]should’st [Dsus]die [D7]for [G]me
Verse 1: Here is [G]love vast as the [C]ocean Loving-[G]kindness as the [D]flood When the [G]Prince of Life our [C]Ransom Shed for [G]us His [D/F#]precious [G]blood[G/C G/B C]
[(REPEAT Verse 1)]
Chorus 1: Who His [G]love will not [D/F#]remember Who can [Dsus]cease to [D]sing His [G]praise He can [Em7]never be for[C2]gotten Throughout [G]Heav'n's e[D/F#]ternal [G]days [G/C G/B C]
{new_page} Verse 2: On the [G]mount of cruci[C2]fixion Fountains [G]opened deep and [D]wide Through the [G]floodgates of God's [C2]mercy Flowed a [G]vast and [D/F#]gracious [G]tide
Chorus 2: Grace and [G]love like mighty [D/G]rivers Poured incessant from [G]above Heav'n's [Em7]peace and perfect [C]justice Kissed a [G]guilty [D/F#]world in [G]love
Repeat Chorus 1:
[G G/C G/B C]
(BRIDGE): [G]No love is higher[G/C2] no love is wider [G/B]No love is deeper[C] no love is truer [G]No love is higher[G/C] no love is wider [G/B]No love is like Your[C] love O Lord
Ending: Here is [G]love vast as the [G/C]ocean [Dsus G/C] [(REPEAT)]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro bridge no love is higher no love is wider no love is deeper no love is truer no love is higher no love is wider no love is like your love o lord verse long my imprisoned spirit lay fast bound in sin and natures night thine eye diffused a quickening ray i woke the dungeon flamed with light my chains fell off my heart was free i rose went forth and followed thee chorus amazing love how can it be that thou my god shouldst die for me verse 1 here is love vast as the ocean lovingkindness as the flood when the prince of life our ransom shed for us his precious blood chorus 1 who his love will not remember who can cease to sing his praise he can never be forgotten throughout heavns eternal days verse 2 on the mount of crucifixion fountains opened deep and wide through the floodgates of gods mercy flowed a vast and gracious tide chorus 2 grace and love like mighty rivers poured incessant from above heavns peace and perfect justice kissed a guilty world in love repeat chorus 1 bridge no love is higher no love is wider no love is deeper no love is truer no love is higher no love is wider no love is like your love o lord ending here is love vast as the ocean
